## Signature

## Notes

You must use one of the following subcommands. Using this command as-is will only produce this help message.

## Subcommands:

| name                                          | type    | usage                                              |
| --------------------------------------------- | ------- | -------------------------------------------------- |
| [`random bool`](/commands/docs/random_bool)   | Builtin | Generate a random boolean value.                   |
